name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gridify: Enhance Your Web Design Workflow

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gridify is a tool to set up a grid on top of any website to follow the grid system of your choice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gridify is a Chrome extension that overlays a grid on any website. It's a great tool for web designers and developers who want to check the layout of a website quickly.
